title: 超現實攝影：日式茶室美女
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位甜美的年輕女性，擁有精緻的五官，留著黑色長直髮與空氣瀏海。身形呈現身形健美且優雅，擁有平滑的肌膚與自然的身體曲線。皮膚細節：陽光映照出的亮麗膚色，帶有自然光澤與絲絨般質地。她戴著復古黑框眼鏡，散發知性魅力，穿著一件寬鬆超大號的白色男士襯衫，呈現微透視質感。場景設定在在傳統日式茶室中，坐在榻榻米上，背景是禪意花園。光影效果：戲劇性的強烈側光，形成深邃的陰影與強烈對比。拍攝規格：使用 Sony A7R V，搭配 35mm 敘事廣角鏡頭拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。
en: Generate a hyper-realistic 8K cinematic masterpiece photography of a sweet young woman with delicate features, obsidian straight hair, wispy bangs. Her physique is graceful athletic build, smooth skin, natural curves. Skin texture: sun-kissed radiant skin, natural glow, soft velvet texture. She is wearing retro black-framed glasses, intellectual vibe, dressed in loose oversized white men's shirt, semi-transparent. The setting is Traditional Japanese tea room, tatami, zen garden background. Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, strong side lighting, deep shadows. Shot with Sony A7R V, 35mm f/1.8, wide angle storytelling. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style.

title: 超現實攝影：台北巷弄的女性
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位氣質成熟的女性，擁有優雅的鵝蛋臉，眼神深邃且神秘，抹著珊瑚色唇膏。身形呈現身材纖細，上圍豐滿具有份量感，腰身極細，雙腿修長。皮膚細節：陽光映照出的亮麗膚色，帶有自然光澤與絲絨般質地。她佩戴著極簡的珍珠項鍊與金色耳環，穿著一件寬鬆超大號的白色男士襯衫，呈現微透視質感。場景設定在在台北的舊巷弄中，午後陽光穿過電線桿，充滿懷舊氛圍。光影效果：戲劇性的強烈側光，形成深邃的陰影與強烈對比。拍攝規格：使用 Sony A7R V，搭配 35mm 敘事廣角鏡頭拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。
en: Generate a hyper-realistic 8K cinematic masterpiece photography of a sophisticated woman, elegant oval face, deep mysterious gaze, coral lips. Her physique is slender build, prominent full bust (沉重感), narrow waist, long legs. Skin texture: sun-kissed radiant skin, natural glow, soft velvet texture. She is wearing minimalist pearl necklace, gold earrings, dressed in loose oversized white men's shirt, semi-transparent. The setting is Taipei old alley, afternoon sun, utility poles, nostalgic. Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, strong side lighting, deep shadows. Shot with Sony A7R V, 35mm f/1.8, wide angle storytelling. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style.

title: 大理石浴室中的高冷內衣美女
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位優雅的時裝模特兒，頸部修長，眼神專注且若有所思。身形呈現身材纖細，上圍豐滿具有份量感，腰身極細，雙腿修長。皮膚細節：濕潤且充滿水感的肌膚，水滴反射著光芒，呈現水靈質感。她穿著一套時尚的蕾絲內衣套裝，擁有精細的織紋細節。場景設定在在高級飯店的浴室裡，坐在大理石浴缸邊，充滿水汽與薄霧感。光影效果：戲劇性的強烈側光，形成深邃的陰影與強烈對比。拍攝規格：使用 Sony A7R V，搭配 35mm 敘事廣角鏡頭拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。
en: Generate a hyper-realistic 8K cinematic masterpiece photography of a elegant model, slender neck, focused and thoughtful eyes. Her physique is slender build, prominent full bust (沉重感), narrow waist, long legs. Skin texture: moist wet skin, droplets reflecting light, dewy finish. She is dressed in stylish lace lingerie set, intricate textures. The setting is Luxury hotel bathroom, marble bathtub, steam haze. Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, strong side lighting, deep shadows. Shot with Sony A7R V, 35mm f/1.8, wide angle storytelling. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style.

title: 2026 新年快樂
zh: 超寫實日系溫泉寫真，清晨暖陽透過障子灑落，溫泉水汽繚繞。一位白皙甜美的女子浸泡在岩風呂中，臉頰帶有泡湯後的自然微紅，眼神溫柔動人，呈現極致的濕潤質感與光影層次。
en: 8K hyper-realistic cinematic photography of a sweet Japanese woman in a traditional indoor hot spring (Onsen). Soft warm lighting through shoji screens, steam haze floating in the air. Natural wet skin with water droplets, rosy cheeks, tender and vulnerable gaze. Shot on Sony A1, 85mm f/1.2 GM, masterful bokeh, raw photo style.

title: 貓耳眨眼特寫
zh: 超寫實日系少女特寫，戴著可愛的白色毛絨貓耳髮箍，俏皮的單眼眨眼表情，清澈的綠色瞳孔與粉嫩妝容，日系空氣感採光。
en: Hyper-realistic close-up portrait of a cute young woman with white fuzzy cat-ear headband. Playful wink, stunning green eyes, soft rosy makeup. Airy Japanese lighting style, highly detailed skin texture.
